12 40 3.20/4.082.39/3.804.18/5.223.60/4.96The accuracy achieved by LOOPER and {\scDiSGro}DiSGro at different loop length usingthe original Fiser data set of loops with 10 –12 residues is listed.
$R_{\rmBkb,ave}$
, and
$R_{\rmBkb,med}$
denote the mean and medianof backbone RMSD, while
$R_{\rmAtm,ave}$
, and
$R_{\rmAtm,med}$
denote the mean and median of all‐heavy atoms RMSD of the lowestenergy conformations with the same loop length.
